name: Wall To Wall
description:
Wall to Wall is an arcade scoring game.
The ball hits from one wall flying off into another and you need to keep the ball in the air by pressing LMB so that it falls into the space between the spikes on the wall.
For each bounce of the ball off the wall, you get a point, and the spikes change their position. Over time, the pace of the game accelerates and you will have to try to set a new record.
